description: This trap signifies that the injection of filters to SN failed
It is of warning class

event.Summary: Injection of filters to SN has failed

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionFailureTrap RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionVnid i 2 PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionType i 1

description: A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: This object corresponds to the vnid id
(bound to an interface) on which filter injection
is not supported or has failed
variables.name: PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionVnid

description: The value of this object corresponds to the remote
injection type
variables.name: PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionType

description: This trap signifies that the injection of filters is not supported
by the SN. It is of warning class

event.Summary: Injection of filters is not supported by the SN

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionIncompatibleTrap RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionVnid i 2 PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionType i 1

description: A unique value for each interface. Its value
ranges between 1 and the value of ifNumber. The
value for each interface must remain constant at
least from one re-initialization of the entity's
network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: RFC1213-MIB::ifIndex

description: This object corresponds to the vnid id
(bound to an interface) on which filter injection
is not supported or has failed
variables.name: PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionVnid

description: The value of this object corresponds to the remote
injection type
variables.name: PDN-FILTER-MIB::sysDevSNInjectionType
